OOC: sorry....hard day at work, i wasn't here yesterday!

IC: Delta was flying out side the door Zardus went in. it was long un-till 
the call came in on his com link.  "Delta, land and decloak" Zardus said. 
"SAY WHAT???!! are you nuts??.........but your the boss!" he decloaked and 
went in the door.
